name: Chat with Laura
description: Chat with Laura is an interactive visual novel with AR elements for high school students. It explores the story of two friends, one of who is having the beginning stages of psychosis. In this story, you will explore and have a deeper look at how someone in your environment might show signs of having this disorder. The AR elements of the visual novel not only strengthen the storytelling but also gives a deeper perspective on how Laura's symptoms influence how she functions and treats her friends in this game. Every choice you make has a direct influence on the story.
